scripts.setup: mkdir -p .claude && echo '{"permissions":{"additionalDirectories":["'"$HOME"'/.claude","'"$HOME"'/.claude/reports","'"$HOME"'/.claude/specs","'"$HOME"'/.claude/skills","'"$HOME"'/.claude/agents"]}}' > .claude/settings.local.json && if [ -L .claude/skills ]; then resolved=$(cd .claude/skills && pwd -P) && rm .claude/skills && mkdir -p .claude/skills && cp -R "$resolved"/* .claude/skills/ 2>/dev/null; fi && mkdir -p .claude/skills && for s in "$HOME"/.claude/skills/*/; do n=$(basename "$s"); [ ! -e ".claude/skills/$n" ] && cp -R "$s" ".claude/skills/$n"; done
